      • doWork

        public void doWork()

      • evaluate

        public com.rapidminer.operator.performance.PerformanceVector evaluate(com.rapidminer.example.ExampleSet testSet,
                                                             com.rapidminer.operator.Model learnResult)
                                                               throws com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorException
        Applies the applier and evaluator (= second encapsulated inner operator). In order to reuse possibly created predicted label attributes, we do the following: We compare the predicted label of testSet before and after applying the inner operator. If it changed, the predicted label is removed again. No outer operator could ever see it. The same applies for the confidence attributes in case of classification learning.
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorException

      • getParameterTypes

        public java.util.List<com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterType> getParameterTypes()
        Specified by:
        getParameterTypes in interface com.rapidminer.parameter.ParameterHandler
        Overrides:
        getParameterTypes in class com.rapidminer.operator.Operator

      • estimatePerformance

        public abstract void estimatePerformance(com.rapidminer.example.ExampleSet inputSet)
                                  throws com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorException
        This is the main method of the validation chain and must be implemented to estimate a performance of inner operators on the given example set. The implementation can make use of the provided helper methods in this class.
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorException
